title: Break the Meta 2.0| Lifesteal Illaoi OP!

embed.description: Break the Meta 2.0 is a League of Legends series that is dedicated to trying new builds and seeing if they actually work. In this game we tried one of my all time favorite champions with a full lifesteal build. I also was in a 2v1 lane. This pre-season seems so weird.

replies.body: This is off-meta? News to me.
The normal build you go is black cleaver, deaths dance, and sterak's gage, also you build more tank then anything. So yeah off meta, plus most people take grasp of the undying. I took deathfire.
